title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 08 October 2014 - XWiki
content:
<momomomomo> has quit  
00:33 <vmassol> has quit  
03:06 <sburjan> has quit  
07:12 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
07:16 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
07:51 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
07:52 <silverdrop> has joined #xwiki  
08:27 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:31 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
08:33 <vmassol> has quit  
08:39 <DarkKnightCZ> there is some kind of caching for macros? If i change macro code, pages that use the macro still show the old code  
08:42 <DarkKnightCZ> hmm, happens only for main wiki though  
08:45 <DarkKnightCZ> oooh, subwiki macro overrides main wiki macro  
08:51 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:18 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
09:20 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
09:28 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:36 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:39 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
09:40 <Lyes> has joined #xwiki  
09:41 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:50 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>  
09:51 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:52 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:55 <vmassol> good morning  
09:56 <vmassol> we still need a volunteer for the 6.3M1 release :)  
09:56 <vmassol> (release planned on Monday so we need to start stabilizing today or tomorrow)  
09:57 <AFKGeek> has joined #xwiki  
09:58 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
11:35 <Slashman> hello, can I just dump the database, replicate the config from an xwiki 5.4 to an xwiki 6.2.1 to perform a migration from 5.4 to 6.2.1? (different machine)  
11:36 <tmortagne> Slashman: don't forget the permanent directory too  
11:36 <vmassol> Slashman: see the backup page on xwiki.org  
11:36 <vmassol> !search backup  
11:36 <vmassol> the first link  
11:37 <vmassol> (it has some content on where all config files are located)  
11:37 <Slashman> yeah, I know this link ;) I'll take the permanent dir too, it's just to perform a server switch, I wanted to be sure that the database upgrade and whatever would work this way  
11:40 <tmortagne> XWiki upgrade the DB yes  
11:48 <vmassol> Denis: "does" or "doesn't"?  
11:48 <vmassol> (on http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11191 )  
11:51 <Denis> doesn't, sorry :)  
12:15 <vmassol> has quit

13:40 <DarkKnightCZ> is there some script for automatic recycle bin emptying? or some analyze tool to show info about that  
13:52 <vmassol> DarkKnightCZ: there are some scripts on e.x.o to clean the recycle bin  
13:53 <vmassol> I guess you could put them in a scheduler job if you wanted  
13:53 <DarkKnightCZ> yup, looking at it now  
13:56 <Denis> has joined #xwiki

14:02 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
14:05 <DarkKnightCZ> can i just delete records from xwikircs table? (one document has there 160k records and it cannot be deleted through web interface)
